original_text: Instead, you yourselves hurt other people, and you even rob them. And those other people are believers like you!
korean_text: 너희는 불의를 행하고 속이는구나 그는 너희 형제로다

sentences.original_text: Instead, you yourselves hurt other people
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 여러분은 다른 사람들을 상하게 합니다

sentences.original_text: And those other people are believers like you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 다른 사람들은 여러분과 같은 신자들입니다
